56779.「おおっ <pc>さん！\n いいところに 来てくださった！\n 大変 大変 大:
Oh, <pc>! What good timing!
It's bad, bad, bad!

56780.「ここにいる ルジナちゃんを 覚えておるかの？\n この前 湯の花を取りにいって:
You remember Rugina? She's the manager of
the springs in the Moncello Spring Gorge
where I asked you to get those minerals.

56781.「湯の花のおかげで 腰の痛みが消えたからな。\n わしも ルジナちゃんに会いにい:
Thanks to the hot spring, my back pain
disappeared. I went back to the hot spring to
see Rugina, but...

56782.「なんと そこで 見るからに邪悪で\n 凶暴そうな魔物と 出くわしたんじゃよ！:
Suddenly, these ferocious looking monsters
came outta nowhere!

56783.「本当にねえ……。\n あの のどかな温泉に 魔物が現れるなんて\n これまで:
It's true... it's such a peaceful spring.
This is the first time monsters have shown
up there...

56784.「最近は あの温泉を目当てに 若い娘さんたちも\n 来てくれてたから 魔物が出た:
I'm really worried about the young ladies
who have been visiting recently and not
knowing about those monsters...

56785.「うむ！ その場にいたギャルたちは 逃がしたが\n 今 どういう状況になっておる:
The gals there escaped, but we don't know
what's going on now. More gals may need help!

56786.「<pc>さん！ どうか 頼む！\n モンセロ温泉峡の温泉に行って 魔物を倒し\:
<pc>! We're beggin' ya! Please go
over there and defeat those monsters for the
sake of those gals and the hot springs!

56787.「おおっ！ なんという 心強い返事じゃ！\n 温泉を愛する セクシーギャルたちの:
Ya know just what to say! For the sake of
those sexy gals and the hot springs, please go
and beat those monsters!

56788.「わかっておると思うが モンセロ温泉峡は\n コニウェア平原の 南西にあるからの:
Moncello Spring Gorge is southwest of
the Coniware Plain, so please be careful out
there!

56789.「おおっ！ なんという 心強い返事じゃ！\n ……と思ったが 今の お前さんには:
You know just what to say! But... it looks
like you're too busy with other requests at
the moment.

56790.「じゃが わしらの頼みも 切実じゃ！\n 温泉を愛する セクシーギャルたちのため:
This is quite urgent! For the sake of those
springs and the sexy gals, please come back
as soon as you're free!

56791.「な…… 断るじゃと……？\n あの温泉に 魔物が居座れば ギャルたちが\n 寄:
Whaddya mean ya won't...? If those monsters
are left wanderin' around, they'll terrorize
all the gals there...

56792.「わしの 老後の楽しみがぁ……。\n うっうっ……。:
My retirement was just getting enjoyable...
*sob, sob*...

56793.「おおっ <pc>さん！\n また こうして来てくださるとは！:
Oh, <pc>! So glad to see you
again!

56794.「今度こそ 頼みを聞いてくれるのかの？\n ルジナちゃんが管理する モンセロ温泉:
Will ya do me a favor? Monsters have
appeared at the hot springs run by Rugina
here!

56795.「本当にねえ……。あそこに 魔物が来るなんて\n これまで なかったことですから:
It's true... the springs have never had
monsters show up before... the girls visiting
there will have no idea.

56796.「<pc>さん！ どうか 頼む！\n モンセロ温泉峡の温泉に行って 魔物を倒し\:
<pc>! We're beggin' ya! Please go
over there and defeat those monsters for the
sake of those gals and the hot springs!

56797.「おおっ <pc>さん！\n モンセロ温泉峡の 温泉に現れた魔物を\n 早くも:
Oh, <pc>! You've already beaten
those monsters at the hot springs!!

56798.「……っと さすがに まだじゃったか。\n 早とちりして すまんかったのう。\n:
Oh no, you've haven't done so yet. Sorry for
being hasty, but I'm worried about the gals
who love the hot springs...

56799.「本当にねえ……。あそこに 魔物が来るなんて\n これまで なかったことですから:
It's true... the springs have never had
monsters show up before... the girls visiting
there will have no idea.

56800.「<pc>さん！ どうか 頼む！\n モンセロ温泉峡の温泉に行って 魔物を倒し\:
<pc>! We're beggin' ya! Please go
over there and defeat those monsters for the
sake of those gals and the hot springs!

56802.「あなたも この先のほこらに 神の緋石があると\n 当たりをつけて 来たのね。さ:
You already knew the Divine Crimsonite is in
the shrine up ahead. I'm impressed.

56803.「えっ……？ メルン水車郷の おじいさんに\n 温泉に現れた魔物を倒してくれって:
What? The old man at the Melun Watermill
asked you to defeat some monsters in the hot
springs?

56804.「この時期に そんな魔物が現れるなんて……。\n もしかしたら その魔物は\n:
I can't believe monsters would appear here
at this time of year... are they after the
Divine Crimsonite...?

56805.「行きましょう <pc>。\n 早く その魔物を 倒さなくっちゃ！:
Let's go! We have to defeat those monsters
quickly!

56806.「それにしても すごい湯気……。\n <pc> 足もとに気をつけてね。:
Whew! Sure is a lot of steam...
Be careful where you step.

56807.「誰か…… いるみたい。\n この温泉に 魔物が現れたってこと\n 知らないのか:
Looks like... someone's here? Don't they know
there's monsters roaming around?

56809.「……ベリンダお姉ちゃん。\n またすこし 胸が 大きくなったんじゃな～い？:
Oh, Belinda... your chest has gotten quite
voluptous, hasn't it?

56810.「そうかな？\n うーん。ちょっと 大きくなったかも。:
Really? You think so? Maybe they've gotten
a little bigger...

56814.「だってえ……。\n お姉ちゃんのは しっとり もちもちしてて\n 触り心地が:
Well... they ARE moist, glutinous, and even
soft to the touch... <heart>

56819.「ねえ ベリンダお姉ちゃん<heart>\n もしかして あの子が アンルシアじ:
Hey, Belinda... isn't that blondie over there
Anlucia?

56820.「ああ。きっと そうだね。\n あの子が アンルシア姫ちゃんさ！:
Yeah, I think it is! That's Princess
Anlucia!

56823.「あたしたち 豪魔将シスターズは\n 魔元帥ゼルドラドさまの命により この温泉の:
We, the Luxurious Demon General Sisters, have
been ordered by Master Zeldrad to destroy the
Divine Crimsonite in these hot springs!

56824.「思わず 温泉を楽しんじゃったけど\n 勇者姫が来たからには 仕事を始めるよ！\:
I was enjoying the hot springs, but now that
the little princess is here...
Brenda! Unlock the shrine!

56828.「待ちなさい！\n あなたたちに 神の緋石を 壊させはしないわ！:
Stop it right there! I won't let you monsters
destroy that stone!

56829.「あっはっはっはっは！\n 笑っちゃうねぇ！ あんな細っこい身体で\n あたした:
Hahaha! That's rich! You think you can stop
us with that flat chest of yours?!

56830.「うふふ。\n ぺったんこのくせに ナマイキ～<heart>:
Hehe... you sure are cocky for someone so
flat! <heart>

56832.「あたしたちはねぇ……\n その辺の魔物とは 格が違うんだよ！:
We're on a totally different level than those
other monsters!!

56833.「そうよ～。\n どんな攻撃も へなちょこにしちゃうのが\n 私たちの チ・カ・:
That's right! Our power makes other attacks
look like child's play! <heart>

56834.「四魔将の中でも 最凶と言われる\n あたしたちの強さを 見せてやろうじゃないか:
We're the strongest of the Four Demon
Generals, so we'll just show you how strong we
really are! Come on, Brenda!!

56836.「<cs_pchero>！ 行くわよ！\n 神の緋石を 守りましょう！！:
Come on, <cs_pchero>!
We have to protect the stone!

56837.「ま まさか…… 私たちが ぺったんこに\n 負け……ちゃう…… なんて……。: How could we... lose... to such a flat...

56838.「く……ぅ…… マデサゴーラさまに……\n 温泉でみがいた…… あたしの肌を\n:
Guhhh.... Lord Madesagora never even... got to
see my skin... after using the hot springs...

56840.「<cs_pchero> ありがとう。\n さっそく 神の緋石に\n 勇者のチカ:
Thank you for your help. Now, let's infuse
the Divine Crimsonite with the Hero's power.

56841.「……これで ここの神の緋石は\n 神代のチカラを取り戻したわ。\n もう 大魔:
The Divine Crimsonite has regained
its power...not even the Demon Lord
can touch it now.

56842.「<cs_pchero>。私は この地の\n 神の緋石が チカラを取り戻したこと:
I'll go and report to Lushenda that the Divine
Crimsonite here has regained its power.

56843.「あなたは メルン水車郷に戻って\n おじいさんに 魔物を倒したことを\n 伝え:
Head back to the Melun Watermill and tell
the old man that the monsters are gone.

56844.「おおっ <pc>さん！\n 晴れやかな その表情…… もしや\n 温泉に現れた:
<pc>! I see that bright expression
on yer face! Did ya defeat the monsters in
the hot springs?<yesno><close>

56845.「むむっ！？ わしの目は フシ穴ではないぞい！\n ギャルたちを守るため モンセ:
Hey! I might be old, but I'm not blind! You
really did defeat those monsters, didn't ya?<yesno><close>

56846.「おおっ！ やはり そうじゃったか！\n しかし……なぜ あんな 邪悪で凶暴な魔:
Oh! I knew it! But why would such evil and
ferocious monsters come there...?

56847.「……なにっ！？\n あの温泉の ほこらに祀られた\n 神の緋石を壊すために 来:
What?! They came to destroy the Divine
Crimsonite hidden behind the springs?

56848.「まあ。神の緋石ですって？\n それでは 昔…… ばあさまに聞かせてもらった\n:
Oh, did you say Divine Crimsonite? It seems
the old fairytales my grandmother used to
tell me were true after all...

56849.「ほこらには 神さまが 地上を守るために\n 残してくれた聖なる石……神の緋石が:
Inside the shrine, there is a sacred stone
that protects the land... the Divine
Crimsonite. We are its sworn protectors.

56850.「私たち 温泉の守り人は\n 長い年月の中で その役目を忘れ……\n ただの温泉:
Over the years, the guardians of the hot
springs had forgotten their role and just
became mere caretakers of the hot springs.

56851.「でも これで 自分たちの役目を思いだせたし\n これからは 神の緋石を守ってい:
But now we remember our role, and we must
raise a strong successor to protect the
Divine Crimsonite...

56852.「<pc>さん。ほんに 世話になったのう。\n これは わしらからの 感謝のしる:
<pc>. Thank ya very much for your
help. This is a token of our appreciation.
Take it!

56853.「<pc>さん。ヤクプさん。\n 本当に ありがとうございました。\n また 温:
Thank you both so much. Please come and
visit the hot springs any time you'd like.

56854.「ルジナちゃんが 行ってしまったか。\n ちょっぴり さみしくなるのう……。: So long, Rugina. I'm gonna miss her...

56855.「じゃが あの温泉が 平和になった今\n これまで通り ギャルたちが押し寄せて\:
Now that the hot springs are safe, I'm sure
the gals will come back and show their sexy
selves like they always have!

56856.「うぷぷぷ<heart> また近いうちに\n モンセロ温泉峡の温泉へ 行くとする:
Fufufu... <heart> I guess I should head
back to those hot springs soon, then!
Thanks so much, <pc>!

78769.「その後で あなたも \n ルシェンダさまの所へ 戻ってきてね。\n これで 神:
Now that all of the Divine Crimsonites are
protected, you should go back and see
Lushenda.
